titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress concerning the role of the United States in ensuring the safety of the Vietnamese boat people.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Asian and Pacific Affairs.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From State.

bill.summary: 8/11/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) the U.S. Government should make every effort to ensure the safety of the Vietnamese boat people; and (2) U.S. naval vessels should be deployed in the South China Sea to search for and rescue Vietnamese boat people.
